DOC.brief_summary: The trial ass effect 30-day major adverse cardiovascular event ( MACE ) rate use quality improvement toolkit among hospital Kerala , India . The quality improvement toolkit include standardized admission discharge set , clinical pathway audit feedback program .
DOC.brief_title: Study Quality Improvement Toolkit Kerala , India , Among Hospitals Treating Acute Coronary Syndrome Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This study cluster randomize , step wedge clinical trial assess implementation effect locally-developed quality improvement toolkit patient acute coronary syndrome ( ACS ) Kerala , India . Hospitals randomize stratification size one five cohort . After four-month baseline period , quality improvement toolkit implement hospital cohort 1 . Through one-way crossover design , hospital continue use quality improvement toolkit end trial acute coronary syndrome ( ACS ) patient . Cohorts 2 5 implement quality improvement toolkit time point 8 , 12 , 16 , 20 month respectively , continue use toolkits time forward end study . The primary outcome 30-day MACE rate , include death , reinfarction stroke , major bleeding . Rates continuously collect compare one interim time point safety efficacy . Final analysis compare MACE rate implementation quality improvement toolkits , account cluster effect hospital , cohort time .
DOC.criteria: Presenting Acute Coronary Syndrome Below Age 18 Patient without Acute Coronary Syndrome
